name: Riches from Dying
description:
This is a quick and fast Weekly Game Jam I made for #130 Dying is Awarded. I started making this game 1/6 when someone game me a good idea about a theme. It's a working prototype game that I might re-make. 

The objective of the game is to walk toward the weapon of your choice to kill yourself to be a ghost to can walk to certain walls to collect coins. I added a small puzzle
